mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.patient_id AS "patientId", a.content AS "content", a.doctor_id AS "doctorId", a.phone AS "phone", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.type AS "type", a.zhenghe_version AS "zhengheVersion", a.zhenghe_system AS "zhengheSystem", a.zhenghe_type AS "zhengheType", a.standby1 AS "standby1", a.delete_mark AS "deleteMark", a.remark AS "remark", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.mender AS "mender", a.creator AS "creator"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zhenghe_idea a
AND a.content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%' '%'+#{content}+'%' concat('%',#{content},'%')
AND a.phone LIKE '%'||#{phone}||'%' '%'+#{phone}+'%' concat('%',#{phone},'%')
AND a.type = #{type}
AND a.zhenghe_version LIKE '%'||#{zhengheVersion}||'%' '%'+#{zhengheVersion}+'%' concat('%',#{zhengheVersion},'%')
AND a.zhenghe_system LIKE '%'||#{zhengheSystem}||'%' '%'+#{zhengheSystem}+'%' concat('%',#{zhengheSystem},'%')
AND a.zhenghe_type LIKE '%'||#{zhengheType}||'%' '%'+#{zhengheType}+'%' concat('%',#{zhengheType},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM zhenghe_idea a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zhenghe_idea( id, patient_id, content, doctor_id, phone, create_date, type, zhenghe_version, zhenghe_system, zhenghe_type, standby1, delete_mark, remark, update_date, mender, creator ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{patientId}, #{content}, #{doctorId}, #{phone}, #{createDate}, #{type}, #{zhengheVersion}, #{zhengheSystem}, #{zhengheType}, #{standby1}, #{deleteMark}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{mender}, #{creator} )
